column4: Can anyone help me install gimp 2.7.4? compile and install? I asked on #gimp but nobody seems to be able to help me
why can you not use the version that is in the repo
unless you are using external repos / PPA's the version in the ubuntu repo will not complain of failed dependencies
what version of ubuntu are you using
do you have any 3rd party repos or PPA's ?
do you have any 3rd party repos or PPA's ?
that will most likley be the cause of your problems
they will be creating (most likley) the cause of your conflicts
gimp 2.6 is the 11.10 version
please focus on what I'm saying
the version of gimp in ubuntu 11.10 is 2.6 - where are you getting 2.7 from ?
2.7.x is an unstable version (but 2.7.4 works on ubuntu 11.10 and supports single-window mode which 2.6.x dosent)
please stop answering questions I'm not asking
please answer the questions I am asking
where did you get gimp 2.7
how did you install it ? from a deb package or by compiling it ?
ok - to that repository will be downloading dependencies that are causing the conflict
if the package is causing conflicts you need to either a.) stop using the external repos b.) conact the owner of those repos and ask them to resolve them for you
we cannot fix external packages - contact the package maintainers
that is a terrible idea
I strongly advise you to talk to the gimp package maintainers and ask them for assitance, you will probably get reasonable help
